subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Newton is not among the N.F.L. leaders in most passing categories, but he is the heart and soul of the 10-0 Panthers, one of only two undefeated teams this season.
snippet: Newton is not among the N.F.L. leaders in most passing categories, but he is the heart and soul of the 10-0 Panthers, one of only two undefeated teams this season.
